jd: From: Shivam Tayal, Quantum World Technologies Inc shivam.tayal@quantumworldit.com Reply to: shivam.tayal@quantumworldit.com Role: AS400 DB2 DBALocation: Culver City CA, Onsite6months contract to hireH1B/USC/GCJob Description: Job Summary: The AS400 DB2 DBA Administrator is responsible for the administration, maintenance, and performance tuning of DB2 databases on AS400 systems. This role ensures the reliability, security, and efficiency of the database environment, supporting business-critical applications and data management processes. Key Responsibilities: Install, configure, and maintain DB2 databases on AS400 systems. Monitor database performance and ensure high availability and reliability. Perform regular database backups and recovery procedures. Troubleshoot and resolve database-related issues and errors. Implement and maintain database security measures. Optimize database performance through tuning and query optimization. Collaborate with application developers to design and implement database solutions. Document database configurations, procedures, and changes. Stay updated with the latest DB2 and AS400 technologies and best practices.
